title: Tillya tepe
description: Tillya tepe ("Golden Hill" or "Golden Mound") is an archaeological site in northern Afghanistan near Sheberghan. A hoard of approx. 20,000 gold ornaments and coins were discovered in six tombs dating to the first century BC.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the Tillya Tepe site, derived from OpenStreetMap Node.
properties.title: OSM location of Tillya Tepe
